ST1001.name: All Students List
ST1001.description: List all students with class and roll number
ST1001.query: SELECT s.id, s.name, s.roll_no, c.class_name FROM students s LEFT JOIN classes c ON c.id = s.class_id;

ST1002.name: Students by Class
ST1002.description: Get students for a specific class
ST1002.query: SELECT s.name, s.roll_no FROM students s WHERE s.class_id = :class_id;

AT1201.name: Student Attendance by Date
AT1201.description: Attendance of students on a given date
AT1201.query: SELECT s.name, s.roll_no, sa.status FROM student_attendance sa JOIN students s ON s.id = sa.student_id WHERE sa.date = :date;

AT1202.name: Student Attendance Summary
AT1202.description: Present, Absent, Leave count for a date
AT1202.query: SELECT sa.status, COUNT(*) AS total FROM student_attendance sa WHERE sa.date = :date GROUP BY sa.status;

AT1203.name: Student Attendance Percentage
AT1203.query: SELECT s.id, s.name, COUNT(sa.id) AS total_days, SUM(sa.status = 'Present') AS present_days, ROUND((SUM(sa.status = 'Present') / COUNT(sa.id)) * 100, 2) AS attendance_percentage FROM student_attendance sa JOIN students s ON s.id = sa.student_id GROUP BY s.id, s.name;

TC2001.name: All Teachers List
TC2001.description: List all teachers with subject and contact details
TC2001.query: SELECT u.name, t.subject, t.phone, t.address, t.join_date FROM teachers t JOIN users u ON u.id = t.user_id;

TC2002.name: Teacher Count
TC2002.query: SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_teachers FROM teachers;

TA2101.name: Teacher Attendance by Date
TA2101.description: Attendance of teachers on a specific date
TA2101.query: SELECT u.name, ta.status FROM teacher_attendance ta JOIN users u ON u.id = ta.teacher_id WHERE ta.date = :date;

TA2102.name: Teacher Attendance Summary
TA2102.description: Present, Absent, Leave count for teachers on a date
TA2102.query: SELECT status, COUNT(*) AS total FROM teacher_attendance WHERE date = :date GROUP BY status;

LV3001.name: Teacher Leave Applications
LV3001.description: All teacher leave applications with status
LV3001.query: SELECT u.name, lt.type_name, tl.start_date, tl.end_date, tl.status FROM teacher_leaves tl JOIN users u ON u.id = tl.teacher_id JOIN leave_types lt ON lt.id = tl.leave_type_id;

LV3002.name: Teacher Leave Balance
LV3002.query: SELECT u.name, lt.type_name, tlb.remaining_days, tlb.total_days FROM teacher_leave_balance tlb JOIN users u ON u.id = tlb.teacher_id JOIN leave_types lt ON lt.id = tlb.leave_type_id;

DB4001.name: Today Student Attendance Dashboard
DB4001.query: SELECT sa.status, COUNT(*) AS total FROM student_attendance sa WHERE sa.date = CURDATE() GROUP BY sa.status;

DB4002.name: Today Teacher Attendance Dashboard
DB4002.query: SELECT status, COUNT(*) AS total FROM teacher_attendance WHERE date = CURDATE() GROUP BY status;
